Title: The Reef
Director: Howard E. Baker, John Fox, Kyung Ho Lee
Writer: Anurag Mehta (story), Timothy Wayne Peternel (story), Scott Clevenger (screenplay), Timothy Wayne Peternel (additional writing), Chris Denk (additional writing)
Actors: John Rhys-Davies, Bruno Alexander, Reedy Gibbs, Jimmy Bennett
Plot: One fish must find his destiny to save his home and the love of his life from a bullying shark.
